entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Spatialite causes native crash in spatial tests on Ubuntu impish #27662
  • FileLoadException: System.Runtime v6.0.0 when using scaffolder with latest dotnet-7 feed dotnet-ef tool. #27660
  • Many to Many, Hide One collection Navigation property #27658
  • [CompiledQuery] Expression of type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.Internal.SingleQueryingEnumerable cannot be used for return type 'System.Linq.IQueryable #27657

Closed

  • Different delete behaviour #27661
  • Generate the script for all migrations that have not yet been applied to a given database #21995
  • Queryable projection faults when assigning default values #27659
  • Complex value comparer expressions can not be translated by the in-memory query pipeline #27495
    7.0.0
  • SQLite SaveChanges: Use RETURNING clause #24835
    7.0.0
  • Using SQL Server UTF8 collations #25798
    7.0.0
  • Switch to RETURNING/OUTPUT as the default way to retrieve generated values for INSERT #27503
    7.0.0
  • SQL Server: Optimize SQL Server OUTPUT clause usage when retrieving database-generated values #27372
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add TPC support for migrations #27665
  • [release/6.0] Query: Assign proper type to collection result expression (part 2) #27664
  • Use RETURNING/OUTPUT clause for UPDATE/DELETE #27663

Merged

  • Bump NetTopologySuite.IO.SqlServerBytes from 2.0.0 to 2.1.0 #27518
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Ensure FK properties have nullable-appropriate value comparers #27654
  • Support SQL Server UTF8 strings #27634
  • Improve SQL Server insertion logic and other update pipeline optimizations #27573
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Update to .NET SDK 7.0 Preview 2 #27447
    auto-merge
  • Refactor ReaderModificationCommandBatch #27584
  • Revert "feat (codespaces) - Add initial support for codespaces (#27483)" #27655
